attributes.action: Cancel all league football for the season for health reasons
attributes.additional_details: Before coronavirus kills more people then it should
attributes.background: To stop coronavirus from spreading and killing people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
